text: Gary N Nickels (born 1958) is a retired English boxer. ==Boxing career== Nickels was the National Champion in 1978 after winning the prestigious ABA flyweight title, boxing out of Repton ABC. He represented England in the -51 kg flyweight division, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. He turned professional on 9 October 1978 and fought in 32 fights. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:British male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Flyweight boxers
title: Gary Nickels
